title: Olympic BMX hopeful Twan van Gendt’s bike adds derailleur to shift gears to BMX Gold?
content:
BMX World Champion is on his way to Tokyo 2020 right now with a prototype 2-speed BMX bike that is sure to shake up the Olympics, if not just the conversation. A carbon, geared hardtail with a Zee DH rear derailleur, a chain guide, and flat mount XTR disc brakes, yeah that’s not what usually […]
